active.name: active
active.tooltip: Available symptom slot||Left-click or drag a symptom to add it to the plague.

default.name: default
default.tooltip: Symptoms give additional effects to your plague. Unlock new Symptoms by spreading the Base Plagues and by researching certain technologies.

default.name: default
default.tooltip: A Base Plague can be used by itself, or enhanced with Symptoms.

active.name: active
active.tooltip: Available symptom slot||Left-click or drag a symptom to add it to the Plague.

default.name: default
default.tooltip: Summons a [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Hero that can be expended to spread the concocted Plague to enemy armies and settlements. The Plague may then spread to nearby settlements and armies.

default.name: default
default.tooltip: Infects the currently selected owned settlement or army with the concocted plague. This will provide positive effects and the plague may then spread to other nearby settlements and armies.

infect_target_holder.componentleveltooltip: Infects the currently selected owned settlement or army with the concocted Plague. This will provide positive effects and the Plague may then spread to other nearby settlements and armies.

craft_plague_holder.componentleveltooltip: Summons a [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Hero that can be expended to spread the concocted Plague to enemy armies and settlements. The Plague may then spread to nearby settlements and armies.

default.name: default
default.tooltip: Recipes become available once the required Symptoms are unlocked. They have upgraded effects but cost more [[img:icon_infections]][[/img]]Infections.

default.name: default
default.text: Concoct a plague to spread [[img:icon_corruption_nur]][[/img]]Nurgle corruption, boost your armies or weaken the enemy. Select a Base Plague and add optional Symptoms for further effects.\n Unlock new Symptoms by spreading the Base Plagues. Plagues continue to spread after being created, and this will also count towards unlocking new Symptoms.

icon_tech_required.componentleveltooltip: Required technology not yet researched.||Left-click to display the technology chain for this item.
